lexUnit.name: bare.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a person or part of the body) not clothed or covered.

sentence.text: He was wearing trousers but his chest was bare .
When he 's finished someone takes him some water and he drinks it , spilling it over his face and down his chest and bare legs and feet .
His black hair was rumpled , giving him a boyish look , and beneath the navy silk dressing-gown he was wearing his smooth , tanned chest was bare .
His feet were bare : his trainers were still buried in the mud .
Her feet were bare .
She wore flared jeans and a tight shirt , a sort of cotton grandpa vest that outlined her breasts , and her feet were bare .
Joe saw Dolly , blanket-wrapped , tumbled hair touching her bare shoulders .
She shook her head , sending her hair tumbling wildly about her bare shoulders .
She saw that her left hand was bare .
His hand firmly cupping her bare elbow , he escorted her through the door and along the passage .
He had blue eyes and his head was bare except for a few short grey hairs .
His head was bare and his smile was just a little rueful , as if he were uncertain of his welcome .
Nina bent and unbent her bare arm .
I stretched my bare arms .
Then he slid his left hand down the back of my little short trousers , splaying his fingers across my bare bottom , and started to tickle me .
Instinctively I take off my shoes and feel the springy grass beneath my bare feet .
Water slopped over the edge of the sink and over her bare feet .
A passing farmer said he was strong enough to prise open the bars with his bare hands .
Oyama is famous for fighting bulls with his bare hands .
Only his bare head remained clear , level with the deck .
Her legs were bare to way above her knees and her legs felt cold and so thin they 'd hardly support her weight .
As he rubbed his bare knees , he saw that every house except his father 's was derelict , gaping .
A white petticoat danced as she lifted her bare right leg .
And she suddenly turned back in the direction they had come and ran all the way , her wet shift slapping against her bare legs .
With her sensuous smile and her bare shoulders , she could be likened to a contented cat who knows she has found a good home .
A red jersey was draped around his bare shoulders and a pair of frayed , rather colourful , men 's braces held up some well-darned green shorts .
He felt the inch of bare skin above his socks as two cold metal bands .
His touch on her bare skin seared like a brand .
She wore a low-necked dress ; her arms were bare .
